Rename Version Label

Use the Rename Version Label dialog box (Actions | Version Label | Rename) to change an existing version label. You can change individual version labels or multiple version labels within a project.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Rename From Enter the version label to rename or click the Browse button to select one.
To Enter the new version label or click the Browse button to select one. Do not use an asterisk (*), a colon (:), double quotes ("), a plus sign (+), or a minus sign (-). Names are limited to 254 characters.
Include files in subprojects This field is available only if a project or folder is selected. Select to rename version labels within subprojects that match the label you want to change.
Selected Files Tab
File list Review the files selected to have a version label renamed.
Properties button Click to display archive, configuration file, or workspace information for the selected files or projects.


See Also
